word: A SPIRIT OF PREJUDICE RESPECTING MEANS CAME OVER US DURING THE PAST WINTER, CAUSING US TO FEEL THAT BROTHER W. WAS ASKING FOR MEANS WHEN HE DID NOT NEED IT. WE NOW ASCERTAIN THAT AT THIS VERY TIME HE WAS REALLY IN WANT, AND WE WERE WRONG IN THAT WE DID NOT INQUIRE INTO THE CASE AS WE SHOULD. WE ACKNOWLEDGE THAT THIS FEELING WAS UNFOUNDED AND CRUEL, THOUGH IT WAS CAUSED BY MISAPPREHENSION OF THE FACTS IN THE CASE.
